[HostSailor](https://hostsailor.com "HostSailor") has established itself as a trusted provider of high quality VPS Hosting, Shared Hosting, [Dedicated servers](https://hostsailor.com/dedicated-servers/ "Dedicated servers"), [Domains](https://hostsailor.com/domain-registration/ "Domains"), and [SSL Certificates](https://hostsailor.com/ssl-certificates/ "SSL Certificates") with top notch support and impeccable reputation and also offers some of the most competitive pricing, without sacrificing on the quality of the products and services.

HostSailor is based in Dubai, UAE and the services are physically located in Netherlands&Romania, all servers are 100% owned, we do not resell any of our [VPS services](https://hostsailor.com/vps-hosting/ "VPS services").
